mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question (description, type_id, choose_a, choose_b, choose_c, choose_d, answer, status, gmt_created, gmt_modified) VALUES (#{content},${type},#{chooseA},#{chooseB},#{chooseC},#{chooseD},${answer},0,NOW(),NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET description = #{content},type_id = ${type},choose_a = #{chooseA},choose_b = #{chooseB},choose_c = #{chooseC},choose_d = #{chooseD}, answer = ${answer},gmt_created = NOW(),gmt_modified = NOW() WHERE id = ${id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO question_type (id, name, gmt_created, gmt_modified) VALUES (null,#{description},NOW(),NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM question AS q1 JOIN ( SELECT ROUND( RAND() * ( (SELECT MAX(id) FROM question WHERE type_id = ${type}) - (SELECT MIN(id) FROM question WHERE type_id = ${type}) ) + (SELECT MIN(id) FROM question WHERE type_id = ${type}) ) AS qid ) AS q2 WHERE q1.id >= q2.qid ORDER BY q1.id LIMIT 1
